title: THE NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET; PHANTOM OF THE OPERA
HENRY, PORTRAIT OF A SERIAL KILLER

subtype: Prize of the European Television Stations
title: LA NOUVELLE
Poster 1991
competition:
At ease as much in fantastic short stories as in
huge, dense and visionary novels,
François Boucq handles derision as the
ultimate weapon at the disposal of a
humanity at odds with herself. His brand
of humour is a very complex one,
particularly fierce and tender at the same
time. Boucq’s characters, so close to us, live
in a universe hardly more out of touch than
our own...

subtype: Body Painting, 4th International Body Painting Contest
title: 4th International Body Painting Contest

director: Académie Royale des Beaux-Arts de Bruxelles
